name: In case of emergency throw the dice!
name_original: In case of emergency throw the dice!
description:
Play in full screen for a better experience.

You're trapped in a dungeon with only one room! Your objective is to escape, and take the dungeon's eggplant with you. To do this you have to get a specific roll of the dice. If you get it then the door will open and you can continue to the next dice, but the roll that you'll need to advance will be rarer and rarer every time, but otherwise, there will be enemies and traps that will appear to make your adventure harder. 

When rolling the dice you're teleported back to the start! So no staying on the door until you get a six.

Controls: 

Movement: W - A - S - D or with the arrow keys

Roll the dice: With the T button

Jump: With spacebar or the up key.

Game made by:

  • Tinch334
  • maph
  • LdobleV
  • Santizan
